Description: A CWE-426: Untrusted Search Path vulnerability exists in SoMachine HVAC v2.4.1 and earlier versions, which could cause arbitrary code execution on the system running SoMachine HVAC when a malicious DLL library is loaded by the product.
clean_description: cwe-426: untrusted search path vulnerability exists somachine hvac v2.4.1 earlier versions could cause arbitrary code execution system running somachine hvac malicious dll library loaded product

Description: On Broadcom BCM4355C0 Wi-Fi chips 9.44.78.27.0.1.56 and other chips, properly crafted malicious over-the-air Fast Transition frames can potentially trigger internal Wi-Fi firmware heap and/or stack overflows, leading to denial of service or other effects, aka B-V2017061205.
clean_description: broadcom bcm4355c0 wi-fi chips 9.44.78.27.0.1.56 chips properly crafted malicious over-the-air fast transition frames potentially trigger internal wi-fi firmware heap and/or stack overflows leading denial service effects aka b-v2017061205
